properties.publicRemarks:
Beautiful Modern Retreat in Canyon Heights

Welcome to one of the most coveted locations in Palm Springs— Canyon Heights. Surrounded by sweeping vistas and desert mountains, this beautifully renovated 3-bedroom, 3.5-bath residence—including a private casita—offers both luxury and tranquility just a hop skip and a jump from downtown. 

Perched above it all with million-dollar views overlooking the Oswit Land Trust, this home combines serene natural surroundings with sleek, modern style. No land lease here—just ownership in a premier gated community with world-class amenities.

Step inside to soaring ceilings, sophisticated stacked stone accents, and contemporary fireplaces that create warmth and elegance throughout. The expansive open-concept layout seamlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas—perfect for both entertaining and relaxing. Viking appliances, designer cabinetry, and a generous center island with seating highlight the chef's kitchen, while the walk-in pantry—with its abundant light.
The primary bedroom is a true retreat, featuring a two-sided fireplace, private patio access, and a spa-like bathroom with separate soaking tub and shower, dual vanities, and a custom walk-in closet.

The guest bedroom is ensuite with a beautifully updated bath and dual sinks. The third bedroom, located in the detached casita, boasts French doors opening to the private backyard oasis—ideal for guests or home office use.

Enjoy complete privacy with a fenced, low-maintenance yard and expansive covered patio perfect for year-round outdoor living. Throughout the home, motorized shutters add security and ease of use. A spacious laundry room.

This gated community offers access to four resort-style pools and spas, tennis and pickleball courts, a clubhouse with fitness center, and scenic walking trails.

Short-term rentals of 30 days or MORE are permitted.
